title: RGG’s Project Century is an action game called Stranger Than Heaven
summary: 最新的AI遊戲新聞！SEGA和龍が如く工作室公布了名為《Stranger Than Heaven》的動作遊戲，原名《Project Century》。遊戲設定在1940年代的東京，玩家將扮演名為Mako Daito的特工，進行偵探工作並在城市中揍壞人。這款遊戲充滿霓虹燈光的場景，劇情看似扣人心弦，讓玩家體驗刺激的動作冒險！
content:
RGG's Project Century is an action game called Stranger Than Heaven | VentureBeat

RGG’s Project Century is an action game called Stranger Than Heaven
Rachel Kaser
@rachelkaser
June 6, 2025 4:59 PM
Share on Facebook
Share on X
Share on LinkedIn
Sega and Ryu Ga Gotoku Studios revealed more details about their previously teased historical title, which was first revealed at last year’s Game Awards and codenamed Project Century. In a trailer shown at Summer Game Fest 2025, RGG revealed that the game is called Stranger Than Heaven. The title reveal trailer did not reveal any details about the game’s release date or platforms, but it did show a glimpse of its action gameplay.
The game’s protagonist, who gives his name as Mako Daito, appears to be some sort of agent of subterfuge. He implies he may not be Japanese and has striking blue eyes that feature prominently in the character art. The trailer’s description also doesn’t reveal any details except that it offers “another glimpse into the game’s world.”
For what it is, the teaser does give a glimpse into the neon-lit environments of 1940’s Tokyo, as well as Daito’s work as a detective. He can apparently investigate items and evidence, LA Noire-style, while also beating down thugs in the city’s seedier corners. One shot of gameplay shows that Daito can apparently show mercy (or not) to some of those thugs.

title: Resident Evil: Requiem takes the franchise back to Raccoon City
summary: 最新的生化危機遊戲《生化危機9：安魂曲》將故事場景回到了經典的拉昆市，預計於2026年2月27日推出。遊戲以單人模式呈現，劇情圍繞FBI特工Grace調查一連串神秘死亡事件，包括她母親的死亡。透過預告片，玩家可以看到拉昆市警局的殘骸，以及在《生化危機3》結局時被核彈摧毀後的城市景象。這次回歸經典場景，讓玩家期待新作帶來的驚喜與挑戰。
content:
Resident Evil: Requiem takes the franchise back to Raccoon City | VentureBeat

Resident Evil: Requiem takes the franchise back to Raccoon City
Rachel Kaser
@rachelkaser
June 6, 2025 4:14 PM
Share on Facebook
Share on X
Share on LinkedIn
The “one more thing” revealed at this year’s Summer Game Fest was a teaser trailer for the latest game in the Resident Evil series — Resident Evil 9, or Resident Evil: Requiem. The trailer drops a few details about the game’s characters and setting, including that the series will apparently return to the ill-fated Raccoon City, as the gutted remains of its police station make an appearance in the trailer. The game is set to launch on February 27, 2026.
Capcom and series producer Jun Takeuchi initially said that the next game in the series would need more time to be revealed — but “more time” apparently meant only 20 more minutes, as the reveal trailer dropped at the end of the show. The cinematic trailer follows an FBI agent named Grace, who’s investigating a series of mysterious deaths, including her mother’s — her mother being Resident Evil Outbreak’s red-suited reporter, Alyssa Ashcroft.
The trailer doesn’t reveal much else, except the game’s release date and that it launches on PC and consoles, and that it is a single-player game. It also includes more visuals showing what’s left of Raccoon City after it was nuked at the end of Resident Evil 3. The series has thus far not returned to the zombified town outside of remakes and remixes of games Resident Evils 1-3.

title: Escape Academy 2: Back 2 School unveiled during Day of the Devs
summary: iam8bit和Coin Crew Games宣布推出《逃脫學院2: 回到校園》，這是屢獲殊榮的《逃脫學院》的續集。這個消息是在「Day of the Devs」活動中公布的。這款遊戲的核心內容是逃脫解謎，讓玩家在挑戰中展現智慧。這個消息讓喜歡解謎遊戲的玩家們可以期待這個新作品的推出，帶來更多刺激和挑戰。
content: iam8bit and Coin Crew Games will unveil Escape Academy 2: Back 2 School, the sequel to the award-winning Escape Academy.

title: Brass Lion Entertainment unveils co-op action RPG Wu-Tang: Rise of the Deceiver
summary: Brass Lion Entertainment公布了合作動作RPG遊戲《Wu-Tang: Rise of the Deceiver》的預告片，這是Ghostface Killah的Angel of Dust系列的首款遊戲。這款遊戲將帶玩家進入一個充滿合作挑戰的世界，讓玩家體驗獨特的遊戲劇情和動作冒險。Brass Lion Entertainment以此展現他們在遊戲開發領域的創新和實力，讓玩家期待這款新作的推出。
content: Brass Lion Entertainment revealed its trailer for its debut game Wu-Tang: Rise of the Deceiver, part of Ghostface Killah's Angel of Dust franchise.

title: Imagine Dragons brothers unveil Night Street Studios’ zany 5v5 team shooter Last Flag
summary: Imagine Dragons樂團的兄弟們成立了Night Street Studios，推出了一款名為Last Flag的瘋狂射擊遊戲。這是一款5對5的團隊射擊遊戲，由獨立遊戲工作室Night Street Games開發。這款遊戲充滿趣味性，讓玩家可以體驗到不同於一般射擊遊戲的遊玩方式，給玩家帶來全新的遊戲體驗。
content: Last Flag, a zany shooter game from Night Street Games, is an indie game studio cofounded by the brothers behind the music band Imagine Dragons.

title: IO Interactive marries Hitman with 007 and MindsEye
summary: IO Interactive宣布將Hitman和007以及MindsEye整合在一起，讓玩家可以在Hitman: World of Assassination中體驗更多元的遊戲內容。這個消息讓玩家可以期待到更豐富的遊戲體驗，結合了不同作品的元素，讓遊戲更加有趣刺激。
content: IO Interactive announced integrations with IO Interactive's Hitman: World of Assassination.

title: Mundfish unveils two new games: The Cube and Ill
summary: Mundfish公布了兩款新遊戲：《The Cube》是多人RPG射擊遊戲，而《Ill》則是第一人稱動作恐怖射擊遊戲。這兩款遊戲將帶給玩家不同的遊戲體驗，一款是以射擊為主的多人遊戲，另一款是恐怖射擊遊戲，讓玩家可以享受到不同風格的遊戲樂趣。Mundfish的新作品讓玩家有更多元的遊戲選擇，期待這兩款遊戲帶來的刺激與挑戰！
content: Mundfish unveiled two new games it will publish -- The Cube, a multiplayer RPG shooter, and Ill, a first-person action horror shooter game

title: Scott Pilgrim EX is a new beat-em-up adventure from Tribute Games
summary: Tribute Games 推出了新的打鬥冒險遊戲《Scott Pilgrim EX》，這是他們開發的另一力作，之前也有《Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge》和即將推出的《Marvel Cosmic Invasion》。這款遊戲在夏季遊戲節首次亮相，讓玩家可以體驗全新的打鬥冒險。
content: Tribute Games, developer of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge and the upcoming Marvel Cosmic Invasion, debuted Scott Pilgrim EX during Summer Game Fest.

title: Marvel’s Deadpool VR coming for Meta Quest 3 and 3S
summary: 漫威的Deadpool虛擬實境遊戲將在今年晚些時候登陸Meta Quest 3和3S頭戴式設備，由Twisted Pixel和Oculus Studios合作開發。這意味著玩家可以透過這些設備身歷其境地體驗Deadpool的冒險故事，讓遊戲更加生動刺激。
content: Marvel’s Deadpool VR is coming to the Meta Quest 3 and 3S virtual reality headsets later this year from Twisted Pixel and Oculus Studios.

title: Felt That Boxing is Muppets meet Punch-Out
summary: 夏季遊戲節上有個超有趣的消息，一款名為「Felt That Boxing」的遊戲被說像是真人版的「綠毯秀」。這款遊戲看起來像是把「綠毯秀」和「大逆襲」結合在一起，讓人眼前一亮。
content: One of the most interesting reveals at Summer Game Fest stood out for looking like a real-time Muppet Show.
